titleStmt.title: The Christians garment A sermon preached in London, by the late faithfull minister of Gods word, Master Paul Bayne.
titleStmt.author: Baynes, Paul, d. 1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. P[urslowe] for Ralph Rounthwaite, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Flower-de-luce and Crowne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Flower-de-luce
